title: Florida Cold Snap Damages Citrus Crop, Strains Power Supplies
description: Florida will endure at least another day of bitter cold that has damaged the state’s citrus crop and prompted a local utility to ask residents to reduce electricity use.
content:
(Bloomberg) Florida will endure at least another day of bitter cold that has damaged the states citrus crop and prompted a local utility to ask residents to reduce electricity use.
THIS CONTENT IS R… [+4485 chars]
de: Kälteeinbruch in Florida schädigt Zitrusfrüchte und belastet die Stromversorgung. Florida wird mindestens einen weiteren Tag bitterer Kälte über sich ergehen lassen, die die Zitrusernte des Staates geschädigt hat und einen örtlichen Energieversorger dazu veranlasst hat, die Bewohner aufzufordern, den Stromverbrauch zu reduzieren.
en: Florida Cold Snap Damages Citrus Crop, Strains Power Supplies. Florida will endure at least another day of bitter cold that has damaged the state’s citrus crop and prompted a local utility to ask residents to reduce electricity use.
la: Florida Frigidum Snap Dampna Citrus Crop, Strains Power Supplies. Florida manebit saltem alius dies frigoris acerbae, qui segetem citri rei publicae laesit et utilitatem localem impulit ut incolas ad usum electricitatis reducendum peteret.

title: Punxsutawney Phil forecasts 6 more weeks of wintry weather during extreme cold spell
description: The news was greeted with a mix of cheers and boos from the tens of thousands who braved temperatures in the single-digits Fahrenheit to await the annual prognostication.

la: Punxsutawney Phil praenuntiat 6 plus septimanas tempestatum hiemalis in maximo frigore incantationis. Nuntium salutatum est cum mixtura plausuum et libellis ex decem milibus quae temperaturas in singulis digitis Fahrenheit exspectant ut annuam prognosticationem opperiantur.

la: In US decies centena millia Orientalium Polar Vortex extenuare vel extendere frigus alliciat. Amarissimae frigoris temperaturae quae frigus reliquerunt in media regione orientali non quoquam eunt, cum maior discidium ad Vortex Polar invenit hoc mense.

title: How climate change and human psychology make this US cold snap feel so harsh
description: The frigid weather gripping much of America is not unprecedented, but it feels that way.
content:
By SETH BORENSTEIN and M.K. WILDEMAN
The brutally frigid weather that has gripped most of America for the past 11 days is not unprecedented. It just feels that way.
The first quarter of the 21st ce… [+6621 chars]
de: Wie der Klimawandel und die menschliche Psychologie dafür sorgen, dass sich dieser Kälteeinbruch in den USA so hart anfühlt. Das kalte Wetter, das weite Teile Amerikas erfasst, ist nicht beispiellos, aber es fühlt sich so an.
en: How climate change and human psychology make this US cold snap feel so harsh. The frigid weather gripping much of America is not unprecedented, but it feels that way.
la: Quam mutationem climatis et psychologia humana hoc US frigus frangere tam asperum sentiat. Tempestas frigida tenax multae Americae non inauditum est, sed hoc modo sentit.

title: Outdoor deaths tied to NYC's extreme cold snap rise to 16, Mayor Mamdani says
description:
People walk through the snow in Brooklyn as a major winter storm moves through the area Jan. 25.
 

Officials said they suspect most of the fatalities involved hypothermia and a few involved overdoses. [ more › ]
content:
At least 16 people have now died outside in New York City during the recent period of extreme cold, Mayor Zohran Mamdani said Monday.
The death toll is two more than officials stated in a previous u… [+3497 chars]
de:
Laut Bürgermeister Mamdani ist die Zahl der Todesfälle im Freien im Zusammenhang mit der extremen Kältewelle in New York auf 16 gestiegen. Menschen laufen in Brooklyn durch den Schnee, während am 25. Januar ein schwerer Wintersturm durch die Gegend zieht.
 

Beamte sagten, sie vermuten, dass die meisten Todesfälle auf Unterkühlung und einige auf Überdosierungen zurückzuführen seien. [ mehr > ]
en:
Outdoor deaths tied to NYC's extreme cold snap rise to 16, Mayor Mamdani says. People walk through the snow in Brooklyn as a major winter storm moves through the area Jan. 25.
 

Officials said they suspect most of the fatalities involved hypothermia and a few involved overdoses. [ more › ]
la:
Mortes foris ligatae ad NYC's frigoris nimiam 16 ortum franguntur, Major Mamdani dicit. Homines per nivem in Brooklyn ambulant sicut tempestas hiemalis maior per aream movet 25 ian.
 

Magistratus dixerunt se suspicari pleraque hypothermia caedes implicatas et paucos overdoses implicatos. [ magis ]

la: Attonitus satellites imagines ostendunt Magnae Lacus celeriter rigentem post inhumanum frigus frangere. Lacus Erie ad 95% constringitur dum Lacus Huron surget 21% in una septimana sicut aer arcticus per regionem expansionem glaciem celeri agit.

title: Climate change is costing the economy—whether climate-deniers admit it or not
description: Cold snaps may delight climate-change deniers, but they don’t come cheap. From billion-dollar winter storms to a $20 trillion global cleanup bill, extreme weather—hot or cold—is draining economies fast. Snowballs may melt away but the costs remain.
content: If youre a climate-change denier in the eastern US, including the president, then the past few weeks have been a dream. Its cold and snowy where I live, you might say, colder and snowier than in year… [+5257 chars]
de: Der Klimawandel kostet die Wirtschaft – ob Klimaleugner es zugeben oder nicht. Kälteeinbrüche mögen Klimaleugner erfreuen, aber sie sind nicht billig. Von milliardenschweren Winterstürmen bis hin zu einer weltweiten Säuberungsaktion in Höhe von 20 Billionen US-Dollar – extreme Wetterbedingungen – ob heiß oder kalt – belasten die Volkswirtschaften schnell. Schneebälle mögen dahinschmelzen, aber die Kosten bleiben bestehen.
en: Climate change is costing the economy—whether climate-deniers admit it or not. Cold snaps may delight climate-change deniers, but they don’t come cheap. From billion-dollar winter storms to a $20 trillion global cleanup bill, extreme weather—hot or cold—is draining economies fast. Snowballs may melt away but the costs remain.
la: Mutatio climatis mercatur in oeconomia - sive negantes caeli admittunt sive non. Frigidae tortum climata-mutationes negantes delectant, sed viles non veniunt. Ex tempestatibus hiemalibus miliardis ad $20 trillion globalis mundi libellum, extrema tempestas calida vel frigida, oeconomiae ieiunium haurit. Snowballs tabescere possunt sed manent sumptus.

title: Once-skittish dumpster kitty invites herself in after a cold snap, becoming a friendly purrmanent resident upon crossing the threshold: ‘She acted right at home’
description:
Scaredy cats are much less fearful when survival is on the line.

Bernadette, die Smoking-Katze, hatte einst Angst vor den Menschen, die durch den Apartmentkomplex streunten, aber diese schreckliche Katze hat gelernt, dass nicht alle Homans gruselige, laute Muldenkipper fahren, die Sie umwerfen …

Bernadette, the tuxedo cat, was once scared of the people who roamed the apartment complex, but this frightful kitty learned that not all hoomans drive spooky, loud dump trucks that upend your…

Bernadette, cattus tuxedo, olim ab hominibus qui in complexu diaetae vagabantur, pertimuit, sed hoc terribile catulum didicit quod non omnes homines spooky pellunt, magna dump aliquet quae tuam suspendunt…

title: Cat invites herself into stranger's home after cold snap, human feeds her chicken nuggets and she stays for good: 'I don't think she stopped purring any time my hands were on her'
description:
Chicken nuggets would win anyone over. 
Food is something that holds an emotional place for people. It's not about energy or sustenance, as much as it's about an emotional gravity to cooking, eating, and meal time. Even with little kids it's used as a reward…
content: Food is something that holds an emotional place for people. It's not about energy or sustenance, as much as it's about an emotional gravity to cooking, eating, and meal time. Even with little kids it… [+1120 chars]
de:
Die Katze lädt sich nach einem Kälteeinbruch in das Haus eines Fremden ein, ein Mensch füttert sie mit Chicken Nuggets und sie bleibt für immer: „Ich glaube nicht, dass sie aufgehört hat zu schnurren, als ich sie berührte.“ Chicken Nuggets würden jeden überzeugen. 
Essen ist etwas, das für Menschen einen emotionalen Platz einnimmt. Es geht nicht um Energie oder Nahrung, sondern vielmehr um die emotionale Bedeutung des Kochens, Essens und der Essenszeit. Auch bei kleinen Kindern wird es als Belohnung genutzt…
en:
Cat invites herself into stranger's home after cold snap, human feeds her chicken nuggets and she stays for good: 'I don't think she stopped purring any time my hands were on her'. Chicken nuggets would win anyone over. 
Food is something that holds an emotional place for people. It's not about energy or sustenance, as much as it's about an emotional gravity to cooking, eating, and meal time. Even with little kids it's used as a reward…
la:
Cattus in alienam domum se invitat postquam franguntur frigora, glebae pullum humanum pascit et pro bono moratur: 'Non puto cessasse purgare aliquando manus meae'. Pullus nuggets vincet. 
Cibus est aliquid, quod locum motus hominum tenet. Non de energia vel alimento, quantum est de gravitatis affectuum coquendi, cibi, farinae tempore. Etiam cum paulo haedos suus 'usus est praemium ...
